title: 112_s1693
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the taxable income of a life insurance company or other insurance company: (1) any non-taxed reinsurance premium. (2) any additional amount paid by an insurance company with respect to the reinsurance for which such non-taxed reinsurance premium is paid. And (3) any return premium, ceding commission, reinsurance recovered, or other amount received by an insurance company with respect to the reinsurance for which such non-taxed reinsurance premium is paid.
